#summary install JAP_REMOTE_WS_NODE_NODEJITSU

=JAP_REMOTE_WS_NODE_NODEJITSU=

==PRE-INSTALLATION==
  * create NODEJITSU account
  * install NODEJITSU CLI

==INSTALLATION==
  * unzip JAP_REMOTE_WS_NODE_NODEJITSU-X.X.X.zip
  * open JAP_REMOTE_WS_NODE_NODEJITSU-X.X.X
  * [CONFIGURE_JAP_REMOTE_WS configure JAP_REMOTE_WS.json]
  * open CONSOLE
    * cd JAP_REMOTE_WS_NODE_NODEJITSU-X.X.X
    * jitsu login
    * jitsu deploy

==IMPORTANT==
